posts.post_title: FS: Very Nice T206 Portraits & 2 HOF Action (ALL SGC Graded)
posts.post_content:

These are being consigned after Thanksgiving, and preference is to sell all and ship to someone on here by next week. 

[url]Jamesmckee2018@gmail.com[/url]

719-757-0008

Going to consignment tonight.
